trans-unit.source: Represents the [<diagnostics>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) element in the Web.config configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'elemento [<diagnostics>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) nel file di configurazione Web.config.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement> class represents the [\<diagnostics>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) element in a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement> classe rappresenta il [ \<diagnostica >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) elemento in un file Web. config.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement.SuppressReturningExceptions%2A> property to true in order to return exceptions to the client for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement.SuppressReturningExceptions%2A> proprietà su true per restituire eccezioni al client a fini di debug.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service returns exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il servizio restituisce eccezioni.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service returns exceptions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il servizio restituisce eccezioni; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.
